info.title: Rollmarking
info.description: These API operations support the rollmarking workflow for a classroom

get.description: Retrieves the health check status from the OneSchool API endpoint
Retrieves summary information about a particular day in a school calendar for a specified school.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

get.summary: Get Student Schedules for a day
get.description: Retrieves the schedule for a student at a school.

parameters.name: enrolmentId
parameters.description: The student enrolment id at a specific school

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

get.summary: Get Teacher Schedules for a day
get.description: Retrieves the schedule for a teacher at a school.

parameters.name: staffCentreId
parameters.description: The teacher id at a specific school

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

area.name: Area 3 (Maths & Junior Secondary)
area.description: THIS INCLUDES:\r\n?\tAround Maths block and across to Junior Secondary\r\n?\tToilets in Maths block
area.specialInstructions:
OUT OF BOUND AREAS INCLUDE:
?	Sportsman Parade end of buildings
?	Car park side of Maths block
?	Areas close to the cars and turning area 
?	Front of the Administration area
?	AREAS TO CHECK:
?	Ensure no students are in Admin carpark

patrols.coverNote: This is a supervisions cover note

area.name: Bus Stop
area.description: Bus stop at the front of the school
area.specialInstructions: Ensure all students catch the bus

get.description: Retrieves the students for a timetabled class.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

absences.note: James has an appointment with the doctor.

get.description: Retrieves attendance-related information for students in a timetabled class.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

post.description: Submits attendance rollmarking information for a timetabled class.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

post.description: Submits attendance rollmarking information for a composite class.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

get.description: Retrieves attendance-related information for students in a composite class.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school

get.summary: Get All Teachers Schedules for a day
get.description: Retrieves the schedule for all teachers at a school.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The bearer access token (JWT) containing the user's claims at a particular school
